ban.list-error: Oops, it looks like there are too many users to display :confused:
ban.list-title-0: List of banned members of the server "{}"
ban.list-title-1: List of 45 banned members of the server "{}"
ban.list-title-2: List of 60 banned members of the server "{}"
ban.no-bans: No member seems to be banned from here
ban.too-high: It seems that this member is too high for me to ban them. :thinking:
ban.user-not-banned: This person is not part of the banned members list :upside_down:

ban-dm: You have just been banned from the server %{guild} :confused:
cant-find-user: Oops, no way to find the user **%{user}**
cant-pin: Oops, I don't have permission to pin messages

clear.not-found: Hmm... impossible to delete these messages. Discord tells me they don't exist :thinking:
clear.too-few: I can't delete so few messages

destop.no-guild: This message does not belong to this server
destop.too-old: I can't delete messages older than %{days} days!

emoji.cant-emoji: Oops, I'm missing the permission `Manage expressions` :confused:

emoji-valid.one: The %{name} emoji has been changed so that it can only be used by the %{roles} role
emoji-valid.many: The %{name} emoji has been changed so that it can only be used by the %{roles} roles

emoji.unrestricted: The %{name} emoji has been changed so that it can be used by everyone
emoji.wrong-guild: Oops, it seems this emoji doesn't belong to this server :thinking:

error: Oops, an unknown error occurred. Try again later or contact support

kick.too-high: It seems that this member is too high for me to kick them out :thinking:

kick-chat: Member %{user} (%{userid}) has been kicked from this server
kick-dm: You have just been kicked from the server %{guild} :confused:
missing-manage-nick: Oops, I'm missing the "Manage nicknames" permission!
missing-user-perms: Oops, you're missing permissions (either manage roles, manage server or manage messages)

mute-config.confirm:
Are you sure you want to setup a "muted" role?
This action may break some advanced permissions in your server, by revoking the 'send messages' permission overwrite from some roles.
mute-config.err: Impossible to do that. Please check my permissions on the server and try again.

success.many: The role has been successfully created and configured! (%{count} channels could not be configured, due to lack of permissions)
success.zero: The role has been successfully created and configured!

success2.many: The role has been successfully configured! (%{count} channels could not be configured, due to lack of permissions)
success2.zero: The role has been successfully configured!

mute-config.tip: *Tip: Using the %{mute} command without any muted role configured will use the Discord official timeout system, which might better suit your needs.*

mute.cant-mute: Oops, it seems that I don't have enough permissions for that... Please give me permission `Manage roles` before continuing.
mute.cant-timeout: Oops, I don't have permission for that... Please give me the permission `Time out members` before continuing, or create a muted role.
mute.list-title-0: List of muted members of the server "%{guild}"
mute.list-title-1: List of 45 muted members of the server "%{guild}"
mute.list-title-2: List of 60 muted members of the server "%{guild}"
mute.mute-high: Oops, it seems that the `muted` role is too high for me to give it... Please fix this problem by placing my role higher than the `muted` role.
mute.no-mute: Oops, it seems that the role `muted` does not exist :confused: Please create it and assign permissions manually.
mute.no-mutes: No member seems to be muted from here
mute.staff-mute: You can't prevent another staff member from speaking
mute.too-high: It seems that this member is too high for me to time out them out :thinking:

mute-dm: You have been muted in the server %{guild}
need-read-history: Oops, I'm missing the permission to "Read Message History" :confused:

pin.error-notfound: Oops, I can't find that message (Error : `%{err}`)
pin.error-toomuch: Oops, impossible to pin this message (do you have more than 50 pinned messages?). Error : `%{err}`

raid-banned: You have been automatically banned from the %{guild} server by the automod system.
raid-kicked: You have been automatically kicked out of the %{guild} server by the automod system. Try again in a few days.
react-clear: I'm unable to find this message :confused:

role.give-pending: Assigning the role to %{n} members, it may take a few minutes...
role.give-roles-higher: You can't give or remove roles higher than yours!

give-success.zero: -> No role could be assigned out of %{m}

role.give-too-high: Oops, it seems that this role is too high for me to give or remove to anyone. Please place my role above the `%{r}` role
role.limit-hit: To avoid spamming Discord, I could only affect %{limit} members. Re-run this command in a few seconds if you want to affect more
role.remove-pending: Revoking the role to %{n} members, it may take a few minutes...

remove-success.zero: -> No role could be revoked out of %{m}

role.temp-grant-success: The role %{role} has been granted to %{user} for %{time}!
role.too-high: Oops, this role is too high for me to change. Please move my role above the role `%{r}` before trying again :confused:

slowmode.cant-slowmode: Oops, I don't have permission to `Manage this channel` :confused:
slowmode.disabled: The slowmode is now disabled in this channel.
slowmode.enabled: The %{channel} channel is now in slowmode. Wait %{s} seconds before sending a message.
slowmode.info: The slowmode of this channel is currently at {} seconds
slowmode.too-long: Impossible to set a frequency higher than six hours

unban-chat: The member %{user} (%{userid}) is no longer banned from this server
unhoist-too-many-members: Oops, your server has too many members for me to do that. Please contact our support team for more info.

warn.cant-staff: You can't warn another staff member!
warn.warn-but-db: Our database being offline, the warning could not be saved. Nevertheless, the member did receive their warning in DM

warn-dm: You have received a warning from the %{guild} server
